title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Skills Through Scenario-Based Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Current practitioners participate in team-based simulations using VR equipment and personal devices, enhancing decision-making and collaboration skills in clinically realistic scenarios. Learners complete three 3-hour intensive sessions weekly, with performance measured through mid-term feedback and final project evaluations

learning_goals: Learners can utilize physical clinical tools (e.g., sphygmomanometer, stethoscope) with 90% accuracy according to patient management scenarios in VR simulation environments
Learners demonstrate communication skills through peer collaboration and role distribution in team-based simulations with an engagement rate of over 80%.
Learners apply structured intervention protocols (e.g., emergency response procedures) in simulations with an accuracy rate of over 85%.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
